title: Individualized Instructional Design for Improving English Proficiency and Mathematical Problem-Solving Abilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Reading Comprehension and Arithmetic Skills
context.additional_context: A course focused on improving practical problem-solving skills required in social domains for learners who are current practitioners. It provides individualized feedback in digital device-based online learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners accurately interpret English-presented math problems related to social issues and achieve an 80%+ accuracy rate
Learners apply math problem-solving strategies through personalized learning paths tailored to their English proficiency levels
Learners analyze formative assessment results to identify at least two areas of weakness and establish improvement plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
